rules.name: Primitive Attributes
rules.description: All entity attributes are objects (not primitives). For example, Integer is used instead of int or Float is used instead of float.

rules.name: Annotation in Entity Class
rules.description: All entities have the @Data annotation from lombok.

rules.name: Annotation in Service Class
rules.description: All logic classes have the @Service annotation.

rules.name: Annotation in Logic Class Attributes
rules.description: All logic classes have persistence attributes (Repositories) annotated with @Autowired.

rules.name: Annotation in Controller Class
rules.description: All controller classes have the @Controller annotation.

rules.name: RequestMapping Annotation in Controller Class
rules.description: All controller classes have the @RequestMapping annotation.

rules.name: Annotation in Controller Class Attributes
rules.description: All controller classes have service class attributes annotated with @Autowired.

rules.name: GET Return Type in Controllers
rules.description: All GET type methods must return attributes of type DetailDTO.

rules.name: Data Annotation in DTO and DetailDTO
rules.description: All DTO and DetailDTO classes have the @Data annotation from Lombok.

rules.name: Attribute Type in DTO and DetailDTO Classes
